Title: Relates to the issuance of winery and cidery license for a certain premises in Orange County
Summary: Relates to the issuance of a winery and cidery license for a certain premises in Orange County in order to allow the licensee to conduct tastings of, and sell cider for consumption so long as the licensee keeps food available for sale to its customers on the premises.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to winery and cidery licenses issued for a premises in Orange County
